alert.note: Alert for San Benito; Santa Clara (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 1:37PM PST until further notice by NWS Monterey
info.description: .Flooding on the Uvas Creek is expected to continue into tonight. Check for the latest road closures before traveling. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of central California and northern California, including the following counties, in central California, San Benito. In northern California, Santa Clara. * WHEN...Until 700 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 135 PM PST, Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Flooding on the Uvas Creek is expected to continue tonight. Check for the latest road closures before traveling. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gilroy. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Keep children away from storm drains, culverts, creeks and streams. Water levels can rise rapidly and sweep children away. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
